name: Asteroid Fields
description: Hey guys, Marcel here, I'm a beginner coder starting out with Unity. This is the second game I've ever made. I created this within a time span of 5 days so not much content. :I.  Its a game about driving and avoiding asteroids. Try to get the highest time, Mine was 91.71s.  Anyways enjoy the game, I'm open to critics and improvements! It's just a simple WASD control btw. Space to brake.
